materials.raw_text: Co: 80 g, Er: 20 g, Ge: 80 g, Pa: 60 g

sourcing.instructions: Co: Supplier of cobalt compounds, Er: Rare earth metals supplier, Ge: Germanium supplier, Pa: Phosphoric acid supplier
steps: Co: Supplier of cobalt compounds, Er: Rare earth metals supplier, Ge: Germanium supplier, Pa: Phosphoric acid supplier
1. Measure 80 g of cobalt powder and place it into a clean mixing bowl.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure 80 g of cobalt powder and place it into a clean mixing bowl.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture into a suitable heat-resistant container.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture into a suitable heat-resistant container.

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow the container to cool slowly to room temperature over 4 hours.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow the container to cool slowly to room temperature over 4 hours.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the container.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the container.
